content.raw: Just want to chime in and say that I see what dan describes.  This is entirely with python bindings.  My tests may not be quite as pure; I had a few additional publish/subscribe loops in there.  But I'm subscribing to a handful and publishing a handful, and I did that maybe 3 times.  It seems highly improbable that my code actions exhausted a 1024 file descriptor limit.
